rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS2041, ATS2101, ATS2682, ATS3041, ATS3101}
For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2676, ATS2681, ATS2683}

proh: ATS2682, ATS2101, ATS3101, GRN2130 or GRN3130, ATS2041, ATS3041, ITA2550, ITA3550, MGR3550 or SPN3550
description: The unit explores social factors in second language acquisition, the nature of first, second and bilingual acquisition, early and late language learning,  the nature of interlanguage,  cognitive, interactionist  and sociocultural models of language and general learning, language attrition, individual differences in language learning, and the role of formal instruction in the language classroom.
